content: **material** craveyarn serenity 100% baby alpaca 2 skeins or any 4ply yarn with a yardage between 400 - 420 yards/ 100 grams 365 - 384 meters / 100 grams **size** one size but easily adjustable add or omit lace pattern repeats march 27 2014 **the pattern has been updated** because there was an error in the chart make sure you download tender scarf version 1
